title: 20 people, including 2 children, found dead on boat drifting in Turks and Caicos
content:
1. 20 people, including 2 children, found dead on boat drifting in Turks and Caicos  CBS News
  2. Boat carrying 20 dead people found floating off Grand Turk island  New York Post
  3. 20 dead bodies were found on a boat floating in the Atlantic, and nobody knows who they are or how they died  Insider
  4. Boat carrying 20 dead bodies found drifting off Turks and Caicos islands  The Independent
  5. Mystery as 20 men, women and kids found dead on a boat drifting near Turks and Caicos islands...  The Sun
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: タークス・カイコス諸島で漂流中のボートから子供2人を含む20人の遺体が発見される
包括2名儿童在内的20人被发现死在特克斯和凯科斯群岛漂流的船上
包括2名兒童在內的20人被發現死在特克斯和凱科斯羣島漂流的船上
